name: Forgotten Frontier
description:
Farm from the safety of your pocket dimension or explore the wilderness of Mnemos to scavenge and capture Figments. This Farm Sim/Creature Catching game is in development now! 

Follow development and join in the discussion on the game's discord: https://discord.gg/WSavTZT

Demo Controls:

-Aim: Press and hold Left Mouse Button/Left Trigger

-Fire Selected Item/Figment: Release Left Mouse Button/Left Trigger

-Swap between Figments and Items: E key/Y Button

-Switch between owned Figments: 1 key (Left)/Left Bumper and 4 key (right)/Right Bumper

-Open Menu: Tab key/Start button

-Target Figment: Right Mouse Button/Right Trigger (This does not assist with Aiming, probably will be removed/reworked)

Known Bugs:

-Multiple capsules containing the same figment can be thrown out until a capsule hits the ground and spawns the figment. 

-Switching between figments and empty capsules while aiming will result in unexpected behavior

-There is no way to close the game right now. Alt+Tab and close from outside is required

-Aiming is super off right now. Doing research into how to fix.

-Firing too quickly will lock up the capsule launcher

-Only the crafting menu is accessible at the moment, but it doesn't work
